title: IBM Cloud Continuous Delivery docs
introduction: Adopt a DevOps or DevSecOps approach by using Continuous Delivery, which includes open toolchains that automate the building and deploying of applications. Use the documentation, architetcure references, and more to support your build and deploy needs.

section_recommended.title: Getting started with Continuous Delivery
section_recommended.description: Learn how to create a simple deployment toolchain that supports development, deployment, and operations tasks.

section_recommended.title: Toolchain availability, templates, and tutorials
section_recommended.description: Learn about the available toolchain templates, and related tutorials, that include specific sets of tool integrations to support development, deployment, and operations tasks.

section_recommended.title: Deploy an app on Kubernetes
section_recommended.description: Learn how to create an open toolchain by using deployment strategies that have Kubernetes as the deployment target.

tiles.title: Beta Terraform resources and data sources, Go SDKs, and HTTP APIs
tiles.description: The Beta Terraform resources and data sources, Go SDKs, and HTTP APIs are now available for working with Toolchains and Tekton Pipelines.
